Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not related to the incident mentioned in the claim, but rather pertains to an unrelated incident from September 2019.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by falsely attributing it to the lockdown in Bihar's Aurangabad, when it actually occurred in September 2019.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the incident and providing false information.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false attribution of the video to the incident mentioned.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the video depicts the incident mentioned, when in fact it is unrelated.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
